title: Ian Holm
summary: Sir Ian Holm Cuthbert CBE (12 September 1931 – 19 June 2020), known as Ian Holm,  was an English actor. Beginning his career on the British stage as a standout member of the Royal Shakespeare Company, he later transitioned into a successful and prolific screen career portraying a variety of both supporting and leading characters, earning critical acclaim and many accolades in the process.[1][2]
